paper_abstract: Using the fixed point method, we prove the fuzzy version of the Hyers-Ulam stability of n-Jordan *-derivations on induced fuzzy C*-algebras associated with the following functional equation f (b -a/3) + f (a - 3c/3) + f (3a - b + 3c/3) = f(a).
paper_title: FUZZY n-JORDAN *-DERIVATIONS ON INDUCED FUZZY C*-ALGEBRAS
